--- select_singer_with_distinct.sql
SELECT
  DISTINCT
  *
FROM
  Singers

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*ast.Hint)(nil),
  With:  (*ast.With)(nil),
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select:   0,
    Distinct: true,
    As:       nil,
    Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Star{
        Star:    20,
        Except:  (*ast.SelectExcept)(nil),
        Replace: (*ast.SelectReplace)(nil),
      },
    },
    From: &ast.From{
      From:   22,
      Source: &ast.TableName{
        Table: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 29,
          NameEnd: 36,
          Name:    "Singers",
        },
        Hint:   (*ast.Hint)(nil),
        As:     (*ast.AsAlias)(nil),
        Sample: (*ast.TableSample)(nil),
      },
    },
    Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM Singers
